space-y-4","children":[["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-700","children":"Salta's cuisine is unlike anywhere else in Argentina. Influenced by indigenous Andean traditions, Spanish colonial heritage, and the harsh beauty of the northwest landscape, the food here is deeply regional. Empanadas salteñas are universally acknowledged as the best in the country, and the peña tradition—dining with live folk music—is an experience unique to this region. Add world-class high-altitude wines and you have one of Argentina's most distinctive food destinations."}],["$","div",null,{"className":"grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-4 text-base","children":[["$","div",null,{"children":[["$","h4",null,{"className":"font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-2","children":"Must-Try Regional Dishes"}],["$","ul",null,{"className":"space-y-1 text-gray-600","children":[["$","li",null,{"children":["• ",["$","strong",null,{"children":"Empanadas salteñas:"}]," Spiced beef in crispy dough, baked in clay oven"]}],["$","li",null,{"children":["• ",["$","strong",null,{"children":"Locro:"}]," Hearty corn, bean, and meat stew (especially May 25)"]}],["$","li",null,{"children":["• ",["$","strong",null,{"children":"Tamales:"}]," Corn masa with meat, wrapped in corn husks"]}],"$L5"]}]]}],"$L6"]}]]}]]}],"$L7","$L8","$L9"]}]
